text: Dennis Roy Yamada (August 20, 1944 – April 12, 2020)Dennis Roy Yamada was an American politician who served in the Hawaii House of Representatives from 1971 to 1983. Yamada went to the University of Missouri and Drake University Law School. Yamada pacticed law in Kauai. He died on April 12, 2020, in Kauai, Hawaii at age 75. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Lihue, Hawaii Category:Drake University alumni Category:University of Missouri alumni Category:Hawaii lawyers Category:Members of the Hawaii House of Representatives Category:Hawaii Republicans Category:Hawaii Democrats
title: Dennis Yamada
